ai-patthana8.29:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.29:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of fragrance, and for the sake of embracing the Dhamma,
ai-patthana8.29:1.1_1: A personal ties to the fragrance, and not in covering the neck, and the teaching doesn’t give rise to new.
ai-patthana8.29:1.1_2: or ties to the fragrant principles, and there are no because of covering with knots.
ai-patthana8.29:2.1_0: One should not give a teaching, and there is no carion-stench, singing, or music.
ai-patthana8.29:2.1_1: One should not give rise to secrets, nor covers, and there is no cause or condition for the sake of fragrance.
ai-patthana8.29:2.1_2: They don’t go to the neighborhood of the Dhamma, nor do they get caught up in the neighborhood of the head, and there are no cause or reason for these things.
ai-patthana8.29:3.1_0: ties to the fragrant, and not with the ties. It doesn’t give rise to the water, and there is no cause or reason for you.
ai-patthana8.29:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
